I believe the most practical solution is to use a 'Custom Form Autoresponder Email.' You can find more details in [the official documentation](https://docs.kentico.com/developers-and-admins/digital-marketing-setup/custom-form-autoresponder-emails).
Additionally, I’ve written a comprehensive article on my blog about [how to implement notification emails](https://milanlund.com/knowledge-base/how-to-send-notification-emails-with-form-data-in-xperience-by-kentico) using custom autoresponder emails.
